snippet: The 49ers secured an automatic bid to the N.C.A.A. tournament, but not before the coach put his visiting father in the hospital and the players went out and conquered their demons.
abstract: Profile of California State University-Long Beach men’s basketball team, led by seniors who will appear in their first NCAA tournament; Long Beach secured an automatic tournament bid by winning the Big West Conference title, but not before coach Dan Monson put his visiting father in the hospital and the players went out and conquered their demons.
lead_paragraph: The 49ers secured an automatic bid to the N.C.A.A. tournament, but not before the coach put his visiting father in the hospital and the players went out and conquered their demons.

headline.seo: N.C.A.A. Tournament: How Long Beach State Got In
headline.main: How Long Beach State Got In
headline.print_headline: Win, Win, Win or Go Home
